title: How to Make Croissant Bread Pudding

steps.headline:
{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/27\/Croissant_pudding_1_297.PNG","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/27\/Croissant_pudding_1_297.PNG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":342,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":564.9333333333333,"licensing":"

\n<\/p><\/div>"}
steps.description: Pre-heat your oven to 320 degrees F, 160 degrees C, or on gas mark 3.

steps.headline: Tear the croissants in small pieces and place them in a bowl.
steps.description: Mix the bread with the raisins.

steps.headline:
{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/c\/cd\/Croissant_pudding_3_280.PNG","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/c\/cd\/Croissant_pudding_3_280.PNG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":342,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":564.9333333333333,"licensing":"

http:\/\/www.videojug.com\/film\/how-to-make-croissant-bread-pudding<\/a> shared with permission\n<\/p>

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p><\/div>"}
steps.description: Cut the vanilla bean down the center of it. Use the knife to scrape the pulp away and onto the bean. Place it in a saucepan with the cream and milk.

steps.headline:
{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/28\/Croissant_pudding_4_883.PNG","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/28\/Croissant_pudding_4_883.PNG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":342,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":564.9333333333333,"licensing":"

http:\/\/www.videojug.com\/film\/how-to-make-croissant-bread-pudding<\/a> shared with permission\n<\/p>

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p><\/div>"}
steps.description: Mix everything on a medium heat and remove from the stove when it starts to boil.

steps.headline:
{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/0\/0d\/Croissant_pudding_5_650.PNG","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/0\/0d\/Croissant_pudding_5_650.PNG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":340,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":562.4,"licensing":"

http:\/\/www.videojug.com\/film\/how-to-make-croissant-bread-pudding<\/a> shared with permission\n<\/p>

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p><\/div>"}
steps.description: Get a bowl and whisk the sugar, eggs, and egg yolks together.

steps.headline:
{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/4\/48\/Croissant_pudding_6_581.PNG","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/4\/48\/Croissant_pudding_6_581.PNG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":343,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":567.4666666666667,"licensing":"

http:\/\/www.videojug.com\/film\/how-to-make-croissant-bread-pudding<\/a> shared with permission\n<\/p>

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p><\/div>"}
steps.description: Pour a little amount of the milk mixture into the bowl and continue whisking. Pour the milk/egg mixture into the saucepan and mix everything thoroughly once more.

steps.headline:
{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/c\/ce\/Croissant_pudding_7_889.PNG","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/c\/ce\/Croissant_pudding_7_889.PNG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":337,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":557.3333333333334,"licensing":"

http:\/\/www.videojug.com\/film\/how-to-make-croissant-bread-pudding<\/a> shared with permission\n<\/p>

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p><\/div>"}
steps.description: Strain the mixture over the croissants and raisins. Soak on the side for about 15 minutes.

steps.headline:
{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/b\/be\/Croissant_puddin_8_231.PNG","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/b\/be\/Croissant_puddin_8_231.PNG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":347,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":572.5333333333333,"licensing":"

http:\/\/www.videojug.com\/film\/how-to-make-croissant-bread-pudding<\/a> shared with permission\n<\/p>

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p><\/div>"}
steps.description: Be sure that the baking tin is greased with butter. Pour the mixture in the tin and evenly spread out the raisins.

steps.headline:
{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/28\/Croissant_pudding_8_739.PNG","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/28\/Croissant_pudding_8_739.PNG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":343,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":567.4666666666667,"licensing":"

http:\/\/www.videojug.com\/film\/how-to-make-croissant-bread-pudding<\/a> shared with permission\n<\/p>

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p><\/div>"}
steps.description: Bake the pudding for 30 to 35 minutes.

steps.headline: Remove from the oven and serve.
